title: Is it me or is LoL pretty much unplayable on the weekends?

replies.body:
Its entirely playable. 

if there are worse players during weekends, that means there are worse players on both teams, and you should have fun carrying. 

You're trying to use an "ELO hell" supporter argument, essentially.
______________
If you're talking about ping, its probably Comcast or whoever your ISP is and how they handle the surge of 'resources', as they call it, demanded during weekends. 

Could also be an increase in signals and bandwidth consuming devices interfering with your stability.

Flawed reasoning.  An influx of bad players doesn't necessarily mean that both sides get the bad apples evenly.  It may be the case that it reduces the chance of getting a feeder to a coinflip, instead of something that happens every once in a while.  And this is true - weekday players are seemingly less noobish from my experience.
Weekends are the only time I play these days, since I don't like SR, 3v3, and ARAM.
unplayable how? You gotta be more specific.
